text: Le Soleil de la Floride is a newspaper in Florida for Francophones and tourists. Le Soleil de la Floride is published monthly from May to September and weekly from October to April. The newspaper was published in Miami since 1983. == Distribution == 350,000 copies are sold in Florida, 100,000 in Quebec, in 35 numbers, giving around 13,000 copies by publication. == Notes and references == == See also == * List of French-language newspapers published in the United States == External links == Category:1983 establishments in Florida Category:Companies based in Miami Category:European American culture in Florida Category:French-Canadian culture in the United States Category:French-language newspapers published in the United States Category:Mass media in Miami Category:Non-English-language newspapers published in Florida Category:Publications established in 1983 Category:Quebec diaspora
title: Le Soleil de la Floride
